title: What's Wrong with Walmart? - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Should you hate or love Walmart? Today, Greg and Colin discuss the retailer's success and what it means for consumers.

Today's topic was submitted by Kevin Crum. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
